title: Restaurante Milan
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is half Indian and half Italian with many vegan options on both menus. Vegan options for Indian food is listed separately, called 'veggie'. The vegetarian options with cheese is listed separately under 'paneer'. Vegans to specify, and the staff will make sure what you order is made accordingly. On weekends lunch served 1:30-4pm. Location is just over the sea. In summertime, the restaurant walls are opened to give it a fully open outdoor feel.
